member.name: T:de.unika.ipd.grGen.libGrPersistenceProviderSQLite.PersistenceProviderSQLite
member.summary: An implementation of the IPersistenceProvider that allows to persist changes to a named graph to an SQLite database (so a kind of named graph DAO; utilizing a package reference to the official SQLite ADO.NET driver). (Design idea: everything reachable from the host graph is stored in the database, in contrast to all graphs/nodes/edges/objects created at runtime, with the elements visible due to graph processing events lying in between)
